title: Server Transfer
body: So I am currently on the OCE server as I live in Australia, but not too many of my friends play League but I have a fair few friends who play on the NA server who play so I was looking at transferring servers, my biggest concern though is would I lag badly doing this? Any input would be appreciated

replies.body: ^ do that, it saves money and if you can be bothered levelling up again can be pretty good
you'd have about 200 ping on NA. try making an account on NA and playing on it, to see if you could get comfortable to it or not.
